tpk::PointingLog

tpk::PointingLog Class Reference

#include <PointingLog.h>

List of all members.

Detailed Description

Pointing observation log file.

A PointingLog object creates a file of pointing obeservations in the format recognised by the "ptconv" utility program that generates file suitable for analysis with TPOINT.

Copying PointingLog objects is not permitted.

Member Function Documentation

void tpk::PointingLog::log ( std::string  id = ""  )  throw (std::ios::failure)

Log pointing observation.

Logs a pointing observation to the current pointing log file.

If the field identifier is the empty string an identifier is constructed by formatting the RA and Dec of the calibration star.

The position of the pointing calibration star is assumed to be the position of the target that the mount virtual telescope is tracking.

Exceptions:
std::ios::failure 
Parameters:
id  Field identifier

void tpk::PointingLog::log ( double  ra,
double  dec,
std::string  id = "" 
) throw (std::ios::failure)

Log pointing observation.

Logs a pointing observation to the current pointing log file.

If the field identifier is the empty string an identifier is constructed by formatting the RA and Dec of the calibration star.

Exceptions:
std::ios::failure 
Parameters:
ra  ICRS right ascension of the pointing star (radians)
dec  ICRS declination of the pointing star (radians)
id  field identifier
